Contributor: Neumont, Maurice, 1868-1930, artist.; H. Chachoin, printer.;
Note: Signed "Maurice Neumont" "Visa No. 15.403" appears on the bottom right of the poster. Orientation: Horizontal.
Description: Text in French says there will be an exposition of humorous artists in April to May, 1919. Illustration shows a funny sketch of a man smoking a pipe while walking his dog.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Salon des Humoristes
